title: Her Surrender
description: Everything is falling apart for April Reid. Her latest relationship has self-destructed and the library she runs has been sold to a ruthless corporation that plans to tear it down. All she wants is to forget about her problems. But when she meets Vicki Blake while brooding at a bar one night, she finds her problems have only just begun.Vicki has a reputation for her womanizing ways. The blonde-haired seductress is confident, captivating, and has looks to die for. Although April can see right through the woman’s charming smile, she decides to go home with Vicki, just this once. But when Vicki brings out April’s submissive desires, it leaves both of them wanting more.However, April soon discovers that the woman she shared an unforgettable night with is the vice president of the company that wants to demolish her library. April is determined to stop her, yet she finds Vicki irresistible. Vicki is determined to make April surrender in more ways than one. Every time they collide, neither can resist indulging in their dark desires.But as the tension between them mounts, so do the stakes. Will their volatile love-hate relationship cause everything both of them have worked for to go up in flames?Her Surrender is the second book in the bestselling Irresistibly Bound series. Each book in the series can be read alone.
author: Anna    Stone
